## 1. load package
```{julia}
 using Pipe
 using CairoMakie,AlgebraOfGraphics,MakieThemes
 using MLJ,MLJModelInterface,Random
 import MLJ:transform,predict
 #Makie.set_theme!(ggthemr(:flat))
```

## 2. load data
```{julia}
X,y=@load_iris()
```

## 3. machine learning workflow
### 3.1 load model
```{julia}
AdaBoostClassifier = @load AdaBoostClassifier pkg=MLJScikitLearnInterface
model=AdaBoostClassifier(;n_estimators=100)
```
```{julia}
#| echo: false
 include("../../components/off-canvas.jl")
 show_doc_offcanvas("AdaBoostClassifier",@doc(AdaBoostClassifier))

```


### 3.2 fitting model
```{julia}
mach=machine(model2,X,y)|> fit!
```

### 3.3  evaulate model
```{julia}
evaluate!(mach; resampling=Holdout(), measure=accuracy)
```
